introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Foot Predictions, the privacy of your personal data is a priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our site.

userProvided.title: 2.1. Data Provided by the User
userProvided.content: When you create an account or subscribe to our services, we collect information such as: your first name, last name, email address, and other details necessary to manage your account.

automaticallyCollected.title: 2.2. Automatically Collected Data
automaticallyCollected.content: We also collect information automatically through cookies, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and duration of your visit.

dataUsage.title: 3. Data Usage
dataUsage.content: The data collected is used to: Provide and manage the services offered on our site. Personalize your user experience. Send marketing communications or updates about our services. Comply with legal obligations.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: Your personal data is never sold or rented to third parties. However, we may share it with: Our service providers (payments, hosting, etc.) to ensure the proper functioning of the site. Competent authorities if required by law.

dataProtection.title: 5. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
userRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure, Right to object, Right to data portability.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your user experience and analyze site traffic. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may limit certain functionalities.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
policyChanges.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an update date.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For any questions or requests regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at: services@foot-predictions.com
